argSrc: Actually it would be justified if all German universities charged tuition fees.
argTrg: As long as it is ensured that the funds really benefit the universities directly, one can continue to regard this as social justice.

argSrc: Actually it would be justified if all German universities charged tuition fees.
argTrg: Those who study later decide this early on, anyway.

argSrc: Actually it would be justified if all German universities charged tuition fees.
argTrg: It's always possible to take out a student loan or to earn a scholarship.
